name: project image inpainting training
full_name: h2 Notebook h4 Codes are mainly from Partial Convolution Keras h4 Purpose h4 1 Testing some properties about texture content synthesis for image inpainting task h4 2 This notebook trains 2 models to test the idea from Instance Normalization The Missing Ingredient for Fast Stylization h4 3 And further do some experiment about difference between In and Bn better understanding the idea from A Neural Algorithm of Artistic Style and Perceptual Losses for Real Time Style Transfer and Super Resolution h1 Model h2 Partial Convolution h2 Instance Normalization h2 Generator UNET h2 VGG Extractor h1 Training h2 Prepare Data h2 Objective h2 Train
description: 08155 Model Partial Convolution Instance Normalization Generator UNET VGG Extractor Training Prepare Data Objective Train Image kernel Mask kernel Calculate padding size to achieve zero padding Window size used for normalization Padding done explicitly so that padding becomes part of the masked partial convolution Apply convolutions to mask Apply convolutions to image Calculate the mask ratio on each pixel in the output mask Clip output to be between 0 and 1 Remove ratio values where there are holes Normalize iamge output Apply bias only to the image if chosen to do so Apply activations on the image INPUTS Setup the model inputs outputs pool1 pool2 and pool3 for both perceptual loss style loss fine tune all 0 255 Permute channels and get resulting shape Reshape x and do batch dot product Normalize with channels height and width. Testing some properties about texture content synthesis for image inpainting task 2. com MathiasGruber PConv Keras Purpose 1. 06576 and Perceptual Losses for Real Time Style Transfer and Super Resolution https arxiv. And further do some experiment about difference between In and Bn better understanding the idea from A Neural Algorithm of Artistic Style https arxiv. Notebook Codes are mainly from Partial Convolution Keras https github. This notebook trains 2 models to test the idea from Instance Normalization The Missing Ingredient for Fast Stylization https arxiv.
script: tensorflow.python.keras.utils seed build compute_output_shape get_image loss_valid loss_func show numpy train conv_utils loss_tv randint preprocess_input backend as K PConv2D(tf.keras.layers.Conv2D) layers tqdm tensorflow gram_matrix random loss_hole train_step matplotlib.pyplot backend encoder_layer pandas loss_perceptual l1 call VGG loss_style tensorflow.keras VGG16 InstanceNormalization(tf.keras.layers.Layer) tensorflow.keras.applications.vgg16 __init__ decoder_layer generator
